ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE HDMI Cable, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras: 4*HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDI Video Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 30PCs IR LED;; 8* SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens,72 IR LEDs. OSD Menu, Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on), Metal vandal proof & water proof
16 Channel DVR with 6TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback,4ch SDI + 12ch D1, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, Support eSATA, Support Up to 8 HARD DRIVEs
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
